traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
